CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. It directly uses the 'option.value' and 'option.label' in the HTML content without any sanitization or encoding. An attacker can inject malicious scripts through 'option.value' or 'option.label', which will be executed when the HTML content is rendered in the browser.
